details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.5.29 Formula - Math structure type
details.description: The math structure type shall occur only as a child of a Formula structure element

rule.description: The math structure type shall occur only as a child of a Formula structure element

error.message: The math structure type is nested within %1 tag instead of Formula
